qas.question: How many standalone sixth form colleges are there in Southampton?
What college of further education offers vocational courses and ESOL programs?
What courses does Southampton City College offer to adult students?
What college with the initials BPC is outside of the city but still popular with students from Southampton?
What's the sixth form college named after a person?

context: In addition to school sixth forms at St Anne's and King Edward's there are <a0_0>two<a0_0/> sixth form colleges: Itchen College and <a4_0>Richard Taunton Sixth Form College<a4_0/>. A number of Southampton pupils will travel outside the city, for example to <a3_0>Barton Peveril College<a3_0/>. <a1_0>Southampton City College<a1_0/> is a further education college serving the city. The college offers a range of vocational courses for school leavers, as well as ESOL programmes and <a2_0>Access courses<a2_0/> for adult learners.
